Elliotte Harold wrote:

>Or perhaps what we need is some nice Eclipse refactorings that move test 
>methods into new classes.
>  
>
  Like there is not enough classes around... :-)

  Actually there is a better approaches (still not as nice as one test 
per class).
  I've requested for something like this for Eclipse JUnit support, but 
finally it have a good chance to be implemented in Mylar.
  See https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs//show_bug.cgi?id=111603

  regards,
  Eugene
